prompt.purpose: Craft a brief marketing narrative following the Hero's Journey structure.
prompt.context: The user provides a product or service to feature. Keep the style friendly.
prompt.instructions:
1. Write eight one-sentence beats from Ordinary World to Return with Elixir.
1. Bold each beat title.
1. After the beats, give a 25-word brand takeaway and one call to action.
prompt.inputs: - `{{product}}`: name of the product or service.
prompt.output_format: Short paragraphs in markdown totalling no more than 140 words.
